productCards.description: DaisyUI is a plugin for Tailwind CSS - Beautiful CSS component - Clean HTML with component classes - Customizable and themeable - Only 2KB. No JS, No dependencies - Free!

productCards.title: FullStory ‚Äî Craft a more perfect digital experience
productCards.description: FullStory is your digital experience analytics platform for on-the-fly funnels, pixel-perfect replay, custom events, heat maps, advanced search, Dev Tools, and more.

productCards.title: Fibery ‚Äî Product discovery & development platform
productCards.description: Fibery is a product discovery and development platform. Analyze user feedback, identify top insights, track development, and close the feedback loop.

productCards.title: Features.Vote ‚Äî Listen to your users. Know what to build next.
productCards.description: Let your users post and vote on features they want, driving your product's growth with precision and clarity. üöÄ

productCards.title: Userflow ‚Äî Turbo-charge your user onboarding and convert more customers
productCards.description: Build truly sophisticated user onboarding experiences. React to any element or event in your app using ‚Äúif this, then that‚Äù rules, do branching, and segmentation of users.

productCards.title: Formbricks ‚Äî Harvest user-insights, build irresistible experiences
productCards.description: A free and open source surveying platform. Gather feedback at every point in the user journey with beautiful in-app, website, link and email surveys

productCards.title: LogRocket ‚Äî Stop guessing why bugs happen
productCards.description: LogRocket helps product teams build better experiences for their users. By recording videos of user sessions along with logs and network data, LogRocket surfaces UX problems and reveals the root cause of every bug.

productCards.title: Kinde ‚Äî Simple, powerful authentication you can integrate in minutes
productCards.description: Everything you need for authentication wrapped in one beautiful platform. Free your users from passwords with secure and frictionless one click sign up and sign in. Out of the box support for Enterprise SSO like Azure AD. Let users sign in the way they want with built-in support for a range of social logins. Protect your users from reused or breached passwords with MFA. Stay on brand by customizing your sign up and sign in pages to match your look and feel. Built from the ground up using the best in class security protocols available today.

productCards.title: Insighto ‚Äî Ship features users (really) want
productCards.description: Collect feedback from your customers, prioritize features, and build a product users love.

productCards.title: Frill ‚Äî Feedback, Roadmap and Announcements
productCards.description: Working out what features your customers want is messy business. Frill makes light work of collecting, prioritising and communicating these feature updates.

productCards.title: Tandemz ‚Äî Recruit research participants in just a couple of clicks
productCards.description: Find research participants from all over the world easily, for your interviews, usability tests, and surveys.

productCards.title: Screen Studio ‚Äî Beautiful screen recordings in minutes
productCards.description: Screen Studio makes your mouse movement smooth, automatically zooms in on clicks, applies cinematic motion blur to all the animations, and adds beautiful background around your recording. In a minute your recording becomes a high-quality promotional video.

productCards.title: Kapwing ‚Äî Content creation made easy, accessible, and collaborative
productCards.description: Kapwing is a modern editor for videos, GIFs, and images. Try our free, online tools including Studio, meme maker, resizer, subtitle maker, filters, and more!

productCards.title: Remotion ‚Äî Create videos programmatically
productCards.description: Make real MP4 videos written in React using CSS, SVG, and WebGL to make interesting motion graphics. Use programming to dynamically make different variants of videos and automate it using server-side rendering.

productCards.title: Typeframes ‚Äî Stunning product videos, in minutes
productCards.description: Typeframes lets you create eye-catching product videos to elevate your brand and convert more customers.

productCards.title: Tella ‚Äî Screen recording for entrepreneurs
productCards.description: The screen recorder that edits videos for you.

productCards.title: AI Mirror ‚Äî AI art photo & video editor
productCards.description: AI Mirror is an AI-powered photo & video generation app that transforms your artwork into anime-styles with just a few taps. Our technology can create a brand-new image in the style of your favorite animations. With AI Mirror, you can cartoonize yourself, create a magical avatar, or just have fun with digital art. Give it a try and transform your photos into stunning anime characters!

productCards.title: VEED ‚Äî Anyone can make great video in just a few clicks.
productCards.description: Video editing made simple. Create great videos with a single click. Add subtitles, transcribe audio, browse AI tools, use templates, and much, much more. Try it now!

productCards.title: Replayed - YouTube Production App ‚Äî Creator Economy Services
productCards.description: Replayed helps creators make more meaningful content without risking burn out Sign up for FREE to meet your team. Don't pay until you are happy. Rates from $130 per video.

productCards.title: Creatify ‚Äî Paste a product URL. Video ad made in seconds
productCards.description: An AI-powered tool that quickly generates variety of video ads from any product URL. It analyzes product details, gathers media, and creates engaging visuals and scripts, simplifying video ad production.

productCards.title: CapCut ‚Äî All-in-one video editor
productCards.description: CapCut is an all-in-one video editor that makes video creating and sharing easier.

productCards.title: Lemon Squeezy ‚Äî Sell digital products the easy-peasy way
productCards.description: The all-in-one platform for selling digital products, subscriptions, software licenses, and courses is finally here, and it goes by the name Lemon Squeezy.

productCards.title: Figma ‚Äî The collaborative interface design tool
productCards.description: A collaborative design tool for creating user interfaces, mobile apps, and websites with a wide range of features, including vector editing tools, prototyping, and version control, all in a cloud-based platform.

productCards.title: Whimsical ‚Äî Where product teams align on their next build
productCards.description: Whimsical is the iterative product workspace. We help teams build clarity and shared understanding faster with documentation tools for solving any product challenge.

productCards.title: Craftwork Design ‚Äî UI assets for startup owners & busy designers
productCards.description: High-quality UX/UI and Wireframe Kits, Illustrations, Templates, and Mockups to make your design workflow faster and easier. Craftwork is a small team of designers and developers. We create our own design stuff and follow new cool products around the internet.

productCards.title: draw io ‚Äî Flowchart Maker & Online Diagram Software
productCards.description: diagrams.net is a free and open source cross-platform graph drawing software developed in HTML5 and JavaScript. Its interface can be used to create diagrams such as flowcharts, wireframes, UML diagrams, organizational charts, and network diagrams.

productCards.title: Sketchlie ‚Äî Streamline Ideation, Collaborate, Create. All in real-time
productCards.description: Sketchlie is an online workspace designed for effective collaboration and transforming ideas into reality. Our goal is to give you the tools to turn ideas into reality. Our platform facilitates brainstorming, project planning, and collaboration in real-time, allowing you to work seamlessly and efficiently with your team, no matter the distance.
